Welcome to the DS part of my site!

Right now it's just an online demo of the developer DSi Shop (link in nav bar) and couple DSiWare reviews, but hopefully there will be more content soon. Stuff like info on and links to developer apps (I just feel like the current info could be greatly improved upon).

rmc's DSiWare Reviews:

I've been going through all the DSiWare and decided I should do reviews on every single game. I've always wanted a fun way to improve my writing, and here it is!
I hope you can find some new awesome (or awful) DSiWare from this.
